proj_001.name: Aerospace Bracket Assembly
proj_001.description: Precision aluminum aerospace bracket assembly with tight tolerances for flight-critical applications
proj_001.notes: High precision requirements: ±0.001" on critical dimensions. Material certs required. All tools must be carbide for consistent finish.

parts.name: Main Bracket Body
parts.description: Primary structural bracket with complex geometry and mounting holes
parts.notes: Critical part - requires CMM inspection after machining

setups.name: Roughing Operations
setups.description: Rough machine external profile and large pockets
setups.fixture_notes: Vise with soft jaws, check part orientation with indicator
setups.machine_config: Haas VF-2SS, 10000 RPM max, flood coolant

tools.notes: Primary roughing tool - 1/2" 4-flute for heavy material removal
3/8" endmill for smaller pockets and tight areas

setups.name: Finishing Operations
setups.description: Finish all surfaces to final dimensions and surface finish requirements
setups.fixture_notes: Same vise setup as roughing, minimal re-clamping force
setups.machine_config: Spindle speed 8000 RPM for finishing passes
setups.notes: Surface finish requirement: 32 µin Ra max on all surfaces

tools.notes: 1/4" ball endmill for 3D contoured surfaces and radii
3mm DLC coated endmill for fine detail work and tight tolerances

parts.name: Mounting Plate
parts.description: Flat mounting plate with precision hole pattern
parts.notes: Hole locations critical - use CMM for first article inspection

setups.name: Face and Profile Milling
setups.description: Face both sides and machine external profile
setups.fixture_notes: Double-sided machining - use parallels and indicate both setups
setups.notes: Face mill both sides to thickness, then profile mill perimeter

tools.notes: 12mm AlCrN coated endmill for facing and profiling operations
6mm endmill for fine profiling and corner cleanup

setups.name: Drilling Operations
setups.description: Drill all mounting holes and tap operations
setups.fixture_notes: Use drill press vise for rigid clamping during drilling
setups.machine_config: Lower RPM for drilling, peck cycle recommended
setups.notes: Spot drill first, then drill to size. Deburr all holes.

tools.notes: 5mm TiAlN carbide drill for main mounting holes
6mm spot drill for accurate hole starting
10mm uncoated endmill - shared tool for both parts, general machining operations

proj_002.name: Custom Tooling Fixture
proj_002.description: Steel work-holding fixture for production machining of custom automotive components
proj_002.notes: Completed project - fixture in active use for production runs. Heat treat after machining.

parts.name: Base Plate
parts.description: Heavy steel base plate with T-slots and precision locating features
parts.notes: Heat treat to 30-35 HRC after machining. Stress relieve before final ops.

setups.name: Face Milling
setups.description: Face mill top surface to establish primary datum
setups.fixture_notes: Clamp in 4-jaw chuck, indicate true within 0.001"
setups.machine_config: Heavy cuts, 500 RPM max, flood coolant essential
setups.notes: Take heavy facing cuts to remove scale and establish flat surface

tools.notes: 1/2" endmill for heavy facing operations in steel

setups.name: Pocket Milling
setups.description: Machine T-slot pockets and locating features
setups.fixture_notes: Flip part, indicate off machined face for Z-zero reference
setups.machine_config: Moderate speeds for steel, climb milling preferred
setups.notes: Rough with square endmill, finish with ball mill for smooth surfaces

tools.notes: 1/4" square endmill for pocket roughing and semi-finishing
8mm ball endmill for smooth pocket floors and blend radii

setups.name: Hole Operations
setups.description: Drill mounting holes and threaded features
setups.fixture_notes: Same setup as pocketing, add drilling supports where needed
setups.machine_config: Low RPM for drilling, high-pressure coolant for chip evacuation
setups.notes: Spot, drill, tap sequence. Check tap alignment carefully.

tools.notes: 1/4" spot drill for accurate hole starting in steel
1/8" HSS drill for small clearance holes (qty 2 - spares)

parts.name: Clamp Blocks
parts.description: Adjustable clamp blocks with threaded adjustment mechanism
parts.notes: Higher strength steel for clamp blocks. Heat treat to 40-45 HRC.

setups.name: Profile and Slot Machining
setups.description: Machine external profile and internal adjustment slots
setups.fixture_notes: Gang setup - machine all 4 pieces simultaneously in vise
setups.machine_config: Conservative speeds for 4140, flood coolant mandatory
setups.notes: Pre-machine before heat treat, leave stock for post-HT finishing

tools.notes: 6mm endmill for profiling and slotting operations
2mm thread mill for fine threading operations

setups.name: Finishing Operations
setups.description: Post heat-treat finishing and deburring operations
setups.fixture_notes: Light clamping to avoid distortion of heat-treated parts
setups.machine_config: Light finishing cuts, higher surface speeds for finish
setups.notes: Final finishing after heat treatment. Check dimensions carefully.

tools.notes: 3/16" chamfer mill for deburring and edge breaking
4mm ball endmill for blending sharp corners post heat-treat
